title: Planetarium App Design
description: The goal of this project was to design an possible oficial app for the Porto Planetarium that fulfilled the needs of the staff, this meant that it should include a away of interacting with the public during sessions, listening to audio based on the QR codes of the initial Planetarium exibhition, seeing a calendar with the events, buy session tickets and learn more about the history of the Planetarium. This design was created not only by me but also by Mariana Caridade and Hugo Carvalho.

images.title: Sample Screens
images.description: Landing page, homepage, audio guide page and session quiz page, respectively from left to right

title: Match App Design
description: This project was in colaboration with the Construction Institute from University of Porto. The client needed an application where professinals could login and register building data according to the norms of Heritage Assessment. The App also needed to allow searching for building data, finding and adding building locations and other useful functionalities.

images.title: Sample Screens
images.description: Search Page, Landing Page and Building Map Page

title: ECOSPOTS
description: This project was in colaboration with the Construction Institute from University of Porto. The client needed an application where professinals could login and register building data according to the norms of Heritage Assessment. The App also needed to allow searching for building data, finding and adding building locations and other useful functionalities.

images.title: Sample Screens
images.description: Search Page, Landing Page and Building Map Page

title: Ilustrations (Pack 1)
description: This project is a gathering of some ilustrations made around the theme of flowers (a very common theme for me, I love flowers and drawing them), with some added other elements. All the drawings were made in Adobe Illustrator.

title: Soup Festival (Festival das Sopas)
description: This was a freelance project made for the Soup Festival in Figueira de Lorv√£o. The briefing included the need for posters and social media posts. The identity uses warm colors to relate to the warmth of soup and a fun and think font to appeal to the festival side and to improve visibility. This project was made using Adobe Illustrator, Premiere Pro and After Effects.

title: Wedding Guide
description: This was a freelance project made for a wedding. The briefing included the need for a flyer or editorial element with the steps of the wedding ceremony. There were no specific requirements just that it should be elegant and simple. I drawed a rose for the cover and a rose stem for the back and the rest of the work was maily typographical. This project was made using Adobe In Design.

title: Stanley Morrison Flyer
description: This was a project made for a Typography class where we had to make a flyer that showed information about a Typographer and their most famous font. My flyer is about Stanley Morrison, the creator of Times New Roman. The front of the flyer has all the information and the back has big poster.

title: Self Portrait
description: This was a project made for a Photography class where we had to present a self portrait. The overall look of the pictures is dark because the goal is to show the not so happy parts of me. Each gesture in a away shows an insecurity or dilema.

title: What is Happiness?
description: This was a project made for a Design class where we had to illustrate what is happiness and of course my brain went immediately to food.
